title: The Zero-Click Internet: What It Means for Your Marketing Strategy
description: Is Google stealing your traffic? In this episode of the Duct Tape Marketing Podcast, I sit down with Rand Fishkin, co-founder and CEO of SparkToro and one of the most influential voices in SEO and digital marketing. We dive into the rise of the zero-click internetâ€”where 60% of Google searches end without a clickâ€”and what this means for your SEO strategy, content marketing, and online visibility. Rand shares expert insights on how businesses can adapt, build influence beyond Google, and thrive in a world where search engines and social platforms are keeping users on their sites.
